Looks like it!



```

nick@cohrint:~/gzweb/http/client/assets$ cd turtlebot/

materials  meshes  model-1_2.sdf  model-1_3.sdf  model-1_4.sdf  model.config  model.sdf  model.tar.gz
nick@cohrint:~/gzweb/http/client/assets/turtlebot$ ls materials/textures/

68-04552-1000-RA_Turtlebot_M-F_Standoff_color.png  plate_0_logo.png
